Approved VBA Systems for FTI
Veterans Benefits Administration (VBA) has obtained approval to process or store FTI in the FFR, which allows documents to be viewed via the restricted FTI DOCUMENTS tab within VBMS.
Important
:  Do not store or upload FTI directly into the VBMS electronic claims folder as this system has not been approved for storage.  FTI is stored in the secured FFR.
References
:  For more information on
how to view FTI documents, see the
FTI View Reference Guide
, and
development letters that contain FTI, see
M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii.1.A.2.h
.
